topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53eef91e636872013b8d0100#post_53eef91e636872013b8d0100
That seems repugnantly egotistical and if I may speculate it seems more like they latched onto atheism as a way to feel like they're smarter than theists instead of because of a genuine intellectual conviction.

I find this sort of "atheism" offensive in the same way I see people adopting libertarianism just because they don't want to help anyone who happens to be disadvantaged offensive, it is adopting a philosophy I feel strongly about for terrible ends.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53eef99a6368723f19870000#post_53eef99a6368723f19870000
You have no idea how happy that makes me.
